resources.string: Your access to your hygiene vendo buddy.
Enter your login credentials below — so you can access your hygiene vendo buddy.
Kindly provide your personal details — so other users can connect and engage with you.
Please enter your contact details and secure your account — your email and password will serve as your login credentials.
Please take a moment to review your account details before proceeding. We will then send a one-time pin to your number for a quick verification.
Kindly enter the email associated with your account to initiate the password renewal process. We will then send a one-time pin to your number for a quick verification.
Please enter the one-time PIN (OTP) that we sent to your number
Password must be at least 8 characters long with combinations of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.
Send money to your desired recipient. To initiate the transaction, please provide the recipient\'s phone number and the amount you wish to send.
View all your transactions in one place. This displays a comprehensive list of all the transactions you have made, providing you with a clear overview of your financial activity.
View your profile and account details at a glance.

You have successfully created your personal account and can now officially access your vendo buddy, Hygeia!

As part of our verification process, please enter the One-Time Pin (OTP) that has been sent to your phone number.
Please enter the amount you want to top up

Terms and Conditions:

 • Acceptance of Terms
By accessing and using Hygeia, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please refrain from using our services. 

 • Account Registration
To use Hygeia, you must create an account by providing accurate and complete information, including your first name, last name, gender, birthday, email address, phone number, and password. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and are solely responsible for all activities that occur under your account. 

 • Privacy and Data Protection
We respect your privacy and handle your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. 

 • Use of Services
Hygeia allows you to perform various financial transactions, including (but not limited to) sending money and purchasing products. You agree to use our services for lawful purposes only and in compliance with applicable laws and regulations. 

 • Security Measures
We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your account and personal information. However, you acknowledge that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. 

 • Limitation of Liability
We strive to provide accurate and reliable services, but we do not warrant or guarantee the accuracy, completeness, reliability, or availability of our services. We shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use or inability to use our services. 

 • Modifications to Terms and Services
We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions and our services at any time. Any changes will be effective upon posting an updated version of the Terms and Conditions of Hygeia. Continued use of our services after any modifications constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms. 

 Privacy Policy:

 • Information Collection and Use
We collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and transaction details to provide and improve our services. We may use your information to authenticate your identity, process transactions, and send important notifications. 

 • Information Sharing
We do not sell, rent, or lease your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our business and providing services to you. 

 • Security
We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. 

 • Data Retention
We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law. 

 • Compliance with Laws
We comply with applicable laws and regulations governing the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information. We may disclose your information when required by law or in response to valid legal requests. 

 • Updates to Privacy Policy
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy of Hygeia or by other means. Continued use of our services after any modifications constitutes your acceptance of the revised Privacy Policy.
